radiographic_examinations.findings: Mrs. B underwent 12 ECT treatments with some short-term memory loss reported between treatments but no significant long-term memory changes.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Over the next 4 weeks post-treatment, her mood, appetite, and activity level gradually improved.

radiographic_examinations.findings: 8 ECT treatments were conducted, resulting in a partial response in depression with better appetite and interest in daily activities.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Despite the partial response, Mrs. B remained depressed.
